about_the_game:
Our ‘Virtual Training Ship’ is an educational game designed for maritime professionals, maritime colleges and academies, and those curious about life at sea on a modern merchant vessel. This is a lite version which showcases a few of the custom scenarios we could develop for you!

Features:

  • Time Trial: Engage in a challenging mission where you gather all the correct documentation to show you are properly qualified and prepared before you join your ship. Complete this quickly under a strict time limit before you miss your departure flight and try not to be distracted by Winnie the dog!

  • Explore The Ship: Board and familiarise yourself with your ship as you explore the deck and engine room. The game contains over 50 detailed info boxes written by maritime professionals that provide descriptions of critical equipment found on a modern vessel.

  • Realistic Interactive Boiler: Tackle the challenge of boiler maintenance under the guidance of an engineering officer, enhancing your engineering skills.

Educational Emphasis:

Developed in collaboration with maritime professionals, Virtual Training Ship offers an interactive learning experience that goes beyond entertainment to foster seamanship skills and promote a deep understanding of modern merchant vessel operations and the maritime industry.
